= undo last checkin =
* svn merge -r head:prev path

= revert to revision =
* svn merge -r head:xxxx path
 
= up to revision =
* svn up -r xxxx path

= show log =
* svn log -l10 -v
* svn log -rbase -v
 
= show diff =
* svn log -rbase --diff

= switch workingcopy =
* svn switch http://server/proj/branches/branch1 --ignore-ancestry --force
